backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the main Jay Sports deployment feature to its relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base imports and OKLCH CSS custom property color tokens for both light and dark themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Jay Sports page title, SEO meta tags, favicon referencing the generated logo, and the React root mount div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders only the Home page as the sole route.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying brand story copy, an animated stats grid (years, products, athletes, quality), and a 4-column core values grid with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with real address, phone, and email details plus a validated contact form that shows a success state on submission.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar featuring the Jay Sports logo image, smooth-scroll section links with active highlighting, and a responsive hamburger mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card displaying an image with hover overlay 'Add to Cart' button, category label, name, price, and an optional badge.
Product showcase section rendering a responsive 3-column grid of six ProductCard components with all prices in Indian Rupees (₹349–₹10,999).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for the dark athletic color theme, and declares reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Defines the Home page composed of a full-screen hero section with CTA buttons and stat badges, plus Navigation, ProductShowcase, AboutSection, ContactSection, and a Footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with brand colors (oklch), Barlow font families, a glow box-shadow, and fade/slide keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's versioned state, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for the Jay Sports retail website build.
